title.en: My name is [Fábio](/en/about/) and I am a [creative consultant + developer](/en/services/), [writer](/en/blog/), mystic and traveller.

subtitle.en: Thoughts and essays about Spirit, society, the Web and other media. Also subscribe the [RSS feed](/en/feed/rss.xml) and join the [newsletter.](http://eepurl.com/gNzLRz)
